description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Board' for rendering a 3x3 gameboard in a Tic Tac Toe game, with styling, theming, and cell interaction handling.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: React functional component rendering the game board, handling cell presses, and optionally highlighting winning lines.

methods.name: handlePress
methods.description: Creates a callback for handling press events on cells, passing the cell index to the parent handler.
